text:
The memory profiling test function fails sporadically : sometimes the measured memory consumption is equal to 0.0, thus the  ̀test_memory_usage`fails.
The issue is related to`memory_profiler` measures accuracy, maybe it could be fixed by performing several measures and returning the max.
